name: Sir Dice Kicker
description:
Kick Dice!

Sir Dice Kicker is the only knight powerful enough to wield the Dice of Fate against a terrifying skeleton invasion.

Kick the Dice of Fate into your boney-foes to see the powerful effect of each roll. No two sides hold the same power. How many skeletons can you take out before they overwhelm you?

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - Move
Spacebar - Kick!

Developers:

Michael McCartney and Conner Rust

Credits:

Kenney - Castle 3D models

Nikolay Sautin - Skeleton base mesh
